info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 5 at 12:46AM CDT until April 5 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
FFWSHV
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... East Central Bowie County in northeastern Texas...
* Until 345 AM CDT.
* At 1246 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Texarkana. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Texarkana. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Texarkana, Wake Village, Nash, Mandeville, Genoa and Mount Pleasant.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 3:45 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 3:45 AM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:45 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:45 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
